This category contains facets classifying EMLoT's events and people.

h: Contains a list that includes types of performance activity and primary sources and other subjects of relevance for London's theatrical world (for example, Arrest).
Contains a list of years when events recorded in EMLoT happened.
Contains an alphabetical list of surnames of pre-1642 and post-1642 people in EMLoT.
Contains a list of roles of people involved in the production of primary sources and in the historical activities described in these sources.
Contains a list of years when people in EMLoT involved in events were active.

This category contains facets classifying EMLoT's troupes and venues.

h: Contains an alphabetical list of troupe names.
Contains a list of troupe types.
Contains a list of the countries of origin of troupes.
Contains a list of years when Troupes first appear in EMLoT's data
Contains an alphabetical list of performance venues.
Contains an alphabetical list of venue locations, ranging in extent from a structure to a county.
Contains a list of years when Venues first appear in EMLoT's data

This category contains facets classifying EMLoT's secondary (post-1642) sources.

h: Contains a list of types of secondary sources, from manuscripts to books.
Contains a list of roles of primary producers of secondary sources.
Contains a list of roles of secondary producers of secondary sources.
Contains an alphabetical list of published primary and secondary source author surnames.
Contains an alphabetical list of publishers of primary and secondary sources.
Contains an alphabetical list of the places of publication of primary and secondary sources.
Contains an alphabetical list of repositories in which primary sources and secondary sources consulted by EMLoT's editorial team are held.

This category contains facets classifying EMLoT's primary (pre-1642) sources.

h: Contains list of types of primary and secondary sources, for example: Accounts, Monographs, Plays.
Contains a list describing the genre or social context of primary and secondary sources, for example: Biographical, Civic, Polemical.
Contains a list of those bodies who produced primary and secondary sources, for example: Office of the Revels, Private individual, Single author.
Contains a list of countries in which primary and secondary sources were produced.
Allows filtering of primary sources based on whether they are or are not forgeries.
showing all publication years for EMLoT's primary sources
showing all publication years for EMLoT's secondary sources
